name: An Eventful Horizon (Insane)
portraitText:
Strap yourself in for this nightmare of a track. There's plenty of planets and stars to grab your car at a moments notice and you'll need to drive straight into the path of oncoming celestial bodies to complete this course.

And there's also a point where you need to drive upside down.

And let's not forget about the binary black hole system at the end to cap off an utterly mad death trap of a track.
